CustomField.formula:
AND( Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Particulier_B2C', OR( ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Statut_du_grade__c, 'Processed'), ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Statut_du_grade__c, 'Error'), AND( ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Statut_du_grade__c,''), OR( ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé DC' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé CM' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Attente Validation CM') ) ) ),
OR( AND( Account__r.CotationPF__c <= 9, Account__r.CotationPF__c >= 1, OR( ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé DC' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé CM' ) ) ), AND( Account__r.CotationPF__c = 10, OR( ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé DC' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé CM' ) ) ), AND( Account__r.CotationPF__c < 1, OR( ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé DC' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'Validé CM' ), ISPICKVAL( Account__r.Statut__c, 'En attente analyse CM') ) ), ISBLANK(Account__r.CotationPF__c) ) )
CustomField.label: TECH_OpportunityAuthorized
